alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 05 at 5:58PM HST until December 06 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... .A large north-northwest peaked this afternoon and will slowly ease through midweek. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Large surf of 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores and 12 to 16 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Kauai, Molokai, Niihau and Oahu, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
